TechnicalEvent.Introduction: CodeStrike is a Competitive Programming contest hosted online. Programmers may take up any language of their choice
TechnicalEvent.Rule1: This competition is a competitive programming contest hosted online
TechnicalEvent.Rule4: If codes of 2 people are found, the same points will be deducted
TechnicalEvent.Rule5: Programmers may take up any language of their choice.(C,C++,Python,Java,JavaScript etc)

TechnicalEvent.Introduction: Ninja Coding has 2 Rounds which will test your Knowledge of Competitive Programing,Debugging Skills and Reverse Coding Ability.
TechnicalEvent.Rule2: The Participant will be given a pre-written code with some errors in it.
TechnicalEvent.Rule3: Participant has to make minimum changes in the code so as to make it satisfy all the test cases and generate the desired output

TechnicalEvent.Introduction: ToDo App Contest has 1 Rounds which will test your Knowledge of React,Redux
TechnicalEvent.Rule2: This competition is a competitive coding competition hosted online
TechnicalEvent.Rule4: Entries should be online booked or pre-registered
TechnicalEvent.Rule5: Judging will be done by Indusrty experts from various domains

TechnicalEvent.Introduction: Website cloning is a process that involves creating a modified or complete copy of a website. This process is useful to web designers who want to create a website similar to another without having to write a completely new script
TechnicalEvent.Rule1: It is a group event(limit-6 people
TechnicalEvent.Rule2: You will be given E-commerce Website and you have to implement all the functionality of the same website
TechnicalEvent.Rule3: It is mandatory to submit the project link and demonstration video along with the ppt.
TechnicalEvent.Rule4: Those Qualifying for the final round would be given a chance to present their project in front of a panel of judges
TechnicalEvent.Rule5: Judging will be done by Indusrty experts from various domains

Non-TechnicalEvent.Introduction: The Talk of Titans is a debate competition which tests your communication skills consists of Extempore, Group Discussion and The Ultimate Debate
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule1: Each participant will be given a maximum of 2 minutes to speak on their given topic.
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule2: Each participant will be shown their topic 2 minutes prior to their turn and will have 2 minutes to prepare for the same.
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule3: Exceeding the time constraint will result in significant reduction in marks.
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule4: The participants will be judged on the clarity of the ideas and views they contribute to the discussion, their oratory skills
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule5: Judging will be done by Indusrty experts from various domains

Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule3: Participant must dress in formal attire
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule4: We expect that the participant has a resume along with her/him
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule5: Professinal Decorum is to be maintained throughout the interview process

Non-TechnicalEvent.Introduction: If you have an innovative idea, this is the opportunity to express and work upon the next Fortune 500 aiming to change the world
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule1: This is a group event for the 1 to 4 participants
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule2: After the registration the participants would receive a google form via registerd email id
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule3: All the Participants are required to submit asap
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule4: within the next 2 days  the participants would be informed about their Screening Test results
Non-TechnicalEvent.Rule5: No external intervention will be allowed and the judges decision is final and no changes would be made thereafter
